banner.description: I have a Bachelor's degree in Information Systems and I am a developer focused on Node.js with TypeScript, React, Next.js, and other languages like Go. I work in the creation of web applications, microservices, and APIs as a full-stack developer, always prioritizing scalability and best practices.
freelance.lead: Transforming ideas into scalable products through specialized development, generating fast, high-quality, and maintainable code.
freelance.description: Specialist in architecting robust solutions for clients, I leverage my enterprise sector experience to deliver high-performance code that follows your growth and needs.
freelance.highlights: Experience with various complex mission-critical and high-traffic systems
High-speed delivery focused on long-term code sustainability and best practices
